articles.content: Update: The 'new game' is actually Fast Food Dizzy, a remake created especially using game design package FUZE4 Nintendo Switch. Fast Food Dizzy originally launched on the Sinclair ZX Spectrum, Amstr… [+1991 chars]

articles.title: Fuser (for Nintendo Switch) - Review 2020 - PCMag UK
articles.description: Become the world’s greatest DJ hero
articles.content: Fuser is a video game that lets anyone, regardless of musical talent, combine the drums and rhythmic snaps of Billie Eilishs Bad Guy, the lush horns of Lizzos Good As Hell,  Amy Winehouses Rehab, and… [+8394 chars]

articles.title: Unicorns: the rarest cars ever sold on UK roads - Autocar
articles.description: A look at all the cars and model derivatives that sold in very small numbers in the first place - which ones have you spotted?
articles.content: Aston Martin reckoned it could sell 2000 Cygnets each year and it was initially bullish enough to say that the car would be available only to existing Aston owners. Then it realised that far from bei… [+323 chars]
